game.name: SMITE 2
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Strategy, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases
game.shortDescription: Become a god and wage war in SMITE 2, the free-to-play Unreal Engine 5-powered sequel to the legendary third-person action MOBA. If you love challenging competition, intense action, ability-driven combat, rewarding teamwork, or godly mythology, you’ll see why 40+ million players love SMITE.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become a god and wage war in SMITE 2, the free-to-play Unreal Engine 5-powered sequel to the legendary third-person action MOBA. If you love challenging competition, intense action, ability-driven combat, rewarding teamwork, or godly mythology, you’ll see why 40+ million players love SMITE.

reviewHighlights.text: it's just fundamentally not smite. yes i know it's a different game, but at it's core it doesn't feel like a labor of love... feels more like a necess...
Just dogshit. Somehow looks even worse, game is already full of bots, barely a few thousand people playing apparently. Use of AI in design/art. Also,...
